summary: REQ-8 appears partially addressed: the diff summary indicates an "Open in Google Maps" CTA in the "Visit Our Store" section linking to the provided https://maps.app.goo.gl/TkMaKv9cUV83vhFXA. However, the truncated App.tsx prevents verifying whether the embedded iframe map source was updated to match the same store location (vs a generic Korba view). Several additional, unrelated frontend styling/config/document-title changes were made that were not requested.

missing_requirements.requirement: Update the embedded map shown in the iframe (if feasible) to display the same store location as https://maps.app.goo.gl/TkMaKv9cUV83vhFXA, rather than a generic Korba map view.
missing_requirements.reason: The diff excerpt for the "Visit Our Store" section is truncated, and no iframe src/embed URL change is visible in the provided snippet. The high-level file summary mentions an embedded map and a button, but does not provide evidence that the iframe embed source was updated to the provided location.

hallucinated_features.description: Global theme/styling overhaul (OKLCH dark automotive theme tokens) beyond the requested map-link update.
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest only requests updating the store location map section/link; no styling/theme changes were requested.

hallucinated_features.description: Update of the HTML document title to "Kedia Car Accessories | Korba CG".
hallucinated_features.reason: Not requested by REQ-8; scope was limited to updating the "Visit Our Store" map section/link.
